p: GC/FID. GC Varian 3800 (Varian, USA) equipped with a CP-8410 autoinjector and a 30 m × 0.25 mm DB-5 column (J&W Scientific, USA), film thickness 0.25 μm, carrier gas helium 0.5 ml·min −1, injector and detector FID temperatures 260°C; split ratio 1:100; and injection volume 0.50 μl. A temperature gradient was applied (50°C for 1 minute, then incremented by 4°C min −1 to 250°C, 250°C for 10 minutes).
